comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mrs. Finley Johnson Shepard = Helen Miller Gould Shepard (1868-1938); she's appeared in the LOC uploads before. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Miller_Gould Madge Luella Shepard (b. 1897) and Marjorie Burr Shepard (1894-1982) are her nieces, the daughters of Louis Jennings Shepard and Mattie Lloyd. wc.rootsweb.ancestry.com/cgi-bin/igm.cgi?op=GET&db=:2... Madge married Vladimir Petersen in 1926. Marjorie married Philip Maynard Morgan in 1920.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Several of these people appear on a page of photos of the 1915 Governors Island Garden Party in the New-York tribune., June 06, 1915, [Page 3, Image 49] chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1915-06-06/ed-... Note that Madge and Marjorie only have a single "p" in their last name.
